Installation instructions
=========================

Dependencies
------------

``HavNegpy`` requires the use of `numpy <https://numpy.org/>`_ `scipy <https://scipy.org>`_ `matplotlib <https://matplotlib.org>`_ `mplcursors <https://mplcursors.readthedocs.io>`_

Installation
------------

``HavNegpy`` is currently not yet available on PyPI, but it can be
installed by downloading the source code or cloning the GitHub
repository and running the standard::

	   python setup.py install

command or its usual variants (``python setup.py install --user``,
``python setup.py install --prefix=/PATH/TO/INSTALL/DIRECTORY``,
etc.).

For more info, please open an Issue on the GitHub page.
